title: 服务器报错问题
txt_content:
玩家进入后一直重复这些报错，求大神解答，谢谢啦08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at net.minecraft.util.io.netty.util.concurrent.SingleThreadEventExecutor$2.run(SingleThreadEventExecutor.java:101)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at net.minecraft.util.io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.run(NioEventLoop.java:341)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at net.minecraft.util.io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKeysOptimized(NioEventLoop.java:447)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at net.minecraft.util.io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKey(NioEventLoop.java:480)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at net.minecraft.util.io.netty.channel.nio.AbstractNioByteChannel$NioByteUnsafe.read(AbstractNioByteChannel.java:87)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at net.minecraft.util.io.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioSocketChannel.doReadBytes(NioSocketChannel.java:208)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at net.minecraft.util.io.netty.buffer.AbstractByteBuf.writeBytes(AbstractByteBuf.java:870)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at net.minecraft.util.io.netty.buffer.UnpooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf.setBytes(UnpooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf.java:436)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.read(SocketChannelImpl.java:379)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at sun.nio.ch.IOUtil.read(IOUtil.java:192)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at sun.nio.ch.IOUtil.readIntoNativeBuffer(IOUtil.java:223)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at sun.nio.ch.SocketDispatcher.read(SocketDispatcher.java:39)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN at sun.nio.ch.FileDispatcherImpl.read0(Native Method)
08.01 06:52:36 [Server] WARN java.io.IOException: Connection reset by peer复制代码

replies.author: CMD丶BLOCK
replies.txt_content: 直接把记录文件放出来，这样看貌似不是 插件和mod的问题

CMD丶BLOCK 发表于 2016-1-8 07:43
直接把记录文件放出来，这样看貌似不是 插件和mod的问题
那些记录文件？
